        public static double calculateComfort​(Path path,
                                      Point currentPoint,
                                      Point finalPoint,
                                      int maxCost,
                                      int gridSize,
                                      double comfortSensitivity)
        Calculates the comfort value for a path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path
        currentPoint - The current position
        finalPoint - The final point
        maxCost - The maximum edge cost
        gridSize - The sum of grid width and height
        comfortSensitivity - The comfort sensitivity parameter (k)
        Returns:
        The calculated comfort value
